CustomField.formula: CASE( Transaction_Event_Code__c, "T0000", "General payment received", "T1107", "Payment refund, initiated by merchant", "T0400", "General withdrawal from PayPal account", "T0006", "PayPal Checkout payment", "T0013", "Donation payment", "T0002", "Recurring payment", "T0011", "Mobile payment", "T0007", "Website payment", "T0003", "Pre-approved payment", "Un-Classified" )
CustomField.label: Transaction Classification
